name: Car Mega Stunt Race
description:
Seat belts On! Put the metal to the pedal and race in the best stunt car game. This ramp car jumping features the best tracks, best props, and extremely engaging asphalt tracks to keep you hooked to your daily dose of car racing with sky-high jumps in this beautiful Mega Ramp Car Stunts : Extreme Car Driving Game.

With a huge cavalry of cars including sports cars, muscle cars, hyper cars, and all fun-filled special monster trucks. This Hyper Car Stunt Games : Mega Ramp Car Racing Game will keep you on your toes in this mega ramp car jumping and grab your attention to the detail of fun that is filled in this impossible car stunt game
